meanings.sent1: At the party, they served refreshing ouzos to the guests.
meanings.sent2: The bartender poured two ouzos into the glasses for the customers.
meanings.sent3: The ouzos danced in the glass, tempting everyone to take a sip.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of ouzos filled the room, transporting me to a Greek island.
meanings.sent5: The clear liquid of ouzos shimmered under the lights, inviting me to taste it.

meanings.sent1: The menu listed various ouzos for us to choose from.
meanings.sent2: She brought back a bottle of ouzos from her trip to Greece.
meanings.sent3: The collection of ouzos on the shelf looked like a colorful display.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the different ouzos mingled in the air, creating a unique scent.
meanings.sent5: The labels on the ouzos were all written in Greek, adding to their authenticity.
